text:
Hi Elaine! Thank you so much!
Luckily, after that episode I got an interview at Goodbye Kansas and got the job as a Matchmove artist :grin: and apparently they were okay with me doing my own visa, so if everything goes well I will be starting on End of Feb there. I’m excited!
I also heard back from Bournemouth and they accepted me so I’ll see what to do later on.

Thank you for the link! I applied last year and got to interview stage, but unluckily they don’t sponsor visas so that was the same situation. It gets tiring but there’s always a way!
That’s wonderful news about goodbye Kansas!! I’ve heard great things about them. Congrats!! Also well done on getting accepted to Bournemouth. You have great options now :+1::+1::+1:

Thank you!! Yes, I am excited for the things to come :)
One of my 2020 goals is to learn Python wherever I am working at, so I am trying to do that at least 30 min a day! Do you have any website/recommendations for that?
